channel.title: 'players online'
channel.description: how do i make it so that on the top part of the game screen it shows how many people are online :)

item.title: 'players online'
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Honestly, I told you to read up on Java, or at least learn some JPC. It’d help a lot, and probably take off 200+ posts. Since I feel sorry for you, here’s the code.

sendQuest("@colorhere@ Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8145);
You should be able to do the rest, I just made that from scratch, except for the 8145, so it might not work.

Read full topic

item.title: 'players online'
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Errr 1 min, ill edit this post to have it in … in 1 sec

Remove what ever there was befor, and add this

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @whi@Delta@red@Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@Owner=@whi@delta", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

( I edited to include your server , so no editing needed )

Read full topic
